forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Windy with showers continuing this afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low around 50F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. S winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 50F. S winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 40F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 12C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 53F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
